_comment: This is a template for mod manifest files. Copy this to your mod folder as 'manifest.json'
_comment2: Remove all '_comment' fields before using - they are for documentation only
_comment_id: Unique identifier for your mod. Use lowercase with underscores. Example: 'custom_pokemon_mod'
name: Your Mod Name
_comment_name: Display name shown to users. Example: 'Custom Pokemon Addition Pack'
_comment_version: Semantic versioning (major.minor.patch). Increment for each release.
author: Your Name
_comment_author: Your name or username. Can be a team name.
description: A brief description of what your mod does.
_comment_description: 1-2 sentences explaining the mod's purpose and features.
_comment_game_version: Minimum MonoBall Framework version required. Check the main game version.
_comment_homepage: OPTIONAL: URL to your mod's website, GitHub repo, or documentation.

dependencies._comment_dependencies: OPTIONAL: List other mods that this mod requires to function.

_comment_dependencies_array: If your mod doesn't need dependencies, use an empty array: []

incompatibilities._comment_incompatibilities: OPTIONAL: List mods that conflict with this mod.
incompatibilities.reason: Both mods modify the same core system

_comment_load_order: OPTIONAL: Priority for mod loading (0-1000). Higher numbers load first. Default: 100. Use 200+ for core mods, 0-50 for cosmetic mods.

scripts._comment_scripts: List of script files to load. Scripts are loaded in order.
scripts._comment_enabled: Set to false to disable without removing the script file.

assets._comment_assets: OPTIONAL: Custom assets added by this mod.

data._comment_data: OPTIONAL: Custom data files (Pokemon, items, moves, etc.).

permissions._comment_permissions: OPTIONAL: Special permissions required by this mod.
permissions._comment_file_access: Allow reading/writing files outside mod directory.
permissions._comment_network_access: Allow HTTP requests and network operations.
permissions._comment_core_modifications: Allow modifying core game systems (high risk).
permissions._comment_command_line_access: Allow executing system commands (very high risk).

configuration._comment_configuration: OPTIONAL: User-configurable options for your mod.

encounter_rate.description: Probability of random encounters in tall grass (0.0 - 1.0)

enable_custom_feature.description: Enable the custom feature added by this mod

_comment_tags: OPTIONAL: Tags for categorizing your mod. Examples: 'gameplay', 'graphics', 'audio', 'pokemon', 'items', 'battle', 'world', 'ui', 'quality-of-life'
_comment_screenshots: OPTIONAL: Paths to screenshot images for mod showcases.

changelog._comment_changelog: OPTIONAL: Version history for your mod.

_comment_license: OPTIONAL: License for your mod. Common choices: 'MIT', 'GPL-3.0', 'Apache-2.0', 'CC-BY-4.0', 'All Rights Reserved'
